thread.title: Curry hilariously takes cover to avoid fast-break dunk
thread.title_full: Curry hilariously takes cover to avoid fast-break dunk

title: Curry hilariously takes cover to avoid fast-break dunk
text:
Curry hilariously takes cover to avoid fast-break dunk Steph Curry really wanted no part of that dunk. Post to Facebook Curry hilariously takes cover to avoid fast-break dunk Steph Curry really wanted no part of that dunk.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/stephen-curry-duck-cover-giannis-antetokounmpo-fast-break-dunk-nba-all-star-game-greek/   Curry hilariously takes cover to avoid fast-break dunk Andrew Joseph 10:17   
Screenshot (Photo: Twitter) 
Steph Curry acted with an outstanding sense of self preservation during Sunday's NBA All-Star Game. 
Early in the second half, a steal from the East's Giannis Antetokounmpo led to a 4-on-1 break. That one was, of course, Curry. The two-time MVP reacted in hilarious fashion, diving to the ground and taking cover as the Greek Freak soared in for a dunk. Steph Curry doesn't want to be in the Giannis poster. pic.twitter.com/FXHAl9Afdx 
The NBA All-Star Game has never been an event known for defense, and there was no way Curry was going to risk his basketball reputation and get posterized with the world watching. Steph Curry auditioning for the Knicks pic.twitter.com/7gzyJHfWDV â€” Matt Ellentuck (@mellentuck) February 20, 2017 
He made the right choice. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/stephen-curry-duck-cover-giannis-antetokounmpo-fast-break-dunk-nba-all-star-game-greek/ Most Popular
